com.oracle.openxdx.processor

Interface Processor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OpenDataProcessor

    public interface Processor
    An interface for XDX Processor with defined methods for data extraction, generation of OpenXDX XML from the Database and publishing OpenXDX XML into Database.
    Author:
    Serge Leontiev/Oracle Corp.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void extract(java.io.Writer dataOutput, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
      Extracts raw Data set from the Database based on the CAM Template Database Mapping with provided filters as Map.
      void generate(org.xml.sax.InputSource dataExtract, javax.xml.transform.Result xmlOutput)
      Generates OpenXDX XML based on the CAM Template structure and Data set that has been extracted with extract(Writer, Map) method.
      void publish(org.xml.sax.InputSource payloadXML)
      Publish OpenXDX XML into the Database based on the CAM Template Database Mapping.
      void setDataSource(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
      Sets DataSource object for data access
      void setGenerateExample(boolean isGenerateExample)
      Generates sample XML if no data found
      void setTemplate(org.w3c.dom.Document camTemplate)
      Sets CAM Template for OpenXDX processor as Document object.
      void setTemplate(org.xml.sax.InputSource camTemplate)
      Sets CAM Template for OpenXDX processor as InputSource object.
      void setVerboseXSLT(boolean isVerbose)
      Enables debugging output in XSLT processing

    • Method Detail

      • setTemplate

        void setTemplate(org.w3c.dom.Document camTemplate)
        Sets CAM Template for OpenXDX processor as Document object. The template source must be in the CXF format.
        Parameters:
        camTemplate - CAM Template as Document

      • setTemplate

        void setTemplate(org.xml.sax.InputSource camTemplate)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets CAM Template for OpenXDX processor as InputSource object. The template source must be in the CXF format.
        Parameters:
        camTemplate - CAM Template as InputSource
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • extract

        void extract(java.io.Writer dataOutput,
           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Extracts raw Data set from the Database based on the CAM Template Database Mapping with provided filters as Map. The extracted data will be used for generation of OpenXDX XML through the generate(InputSource, Result) method. The main purpose of this method to create a data set that can be reused in multiple calls of the generate(InputSource, Result) method.
        Parameters:
        dataOutput - The Writer for data extract
        parameters - CAM Parameters as Map
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generate

        void generate(org.xml.sax.InputSource dataExtract,
            javax.xml.transform.Result xmlOutput)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates OpenXDX XML based on the CAM Template structure and Data set that has been extracted with extract(Writer, Map) method.
        Parameters:
        dataExtract - Data Extract as InputSource
        xmlOutput - Generated OpenXDX XML as Result
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • publish

        void publish(org.xml.sax.InputSource payloadXML)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Publish OpenXDX XML into the Database based on the CAM Template Database Mapping.
        Parameters:
        payloadXML - OpenXDX XML as InputSource
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setDataSource

        void setDataSource(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
        Sets DataSource object for data access
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The DataSource object

      • setVerboseXSLT

        void setVerboseXSLT(boolean isVerbose)
        Enables debugging output in XSLT processing
        Parameters:
        isVerbose - Use boolean true or false to enable XSLT output

      • setGenerateExample

        void setGenerateExample(boolean isGenerateExample)
        Generates sample XML if no data found
        Parameters:
        isGenerateExample - Use boolean true or false to generate sample XML
